Catalog_Raisonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 893
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
medium: Porcelaneous stoneware with carved design under celadon glaze
text: The exterior of this small bowl was carved with a double row of lotus petals before being covered in green-blue celadon glaze. Many Goryeo bowls of this type found there way to medieval Japan, where they were highly prized by the aristocracy and religious elites alike.
title: Bowl with lotus petals
